entry.title: Bitcoin Falls 7% From July Highs: Should Holders Prepare For More Losses?
entry.summary:
Bitcoin bulls have had a torrid week. Looking at the price action in the daily chart, not only is the coin down roughly 7% after breaching $70,000 early this week, but cracks are beginning to form. Overall, optimistic traders maintain that the uptrend remains, considering the sharp expansion between July 14 and 21. However, since then, prices have been choppy and mostly moving lower, signaling the possible presence of bears.
More Pain For Bitcoin Holders?
In light of this volatile price action, one analyst is cautious of what lies ahead, even predicting that Bitcoin might, after all, continue dropping in the sessions to come. Taking to X, the analyst shared trading data, which suggests that bears are in control, at least for now.
Specifically, the analyst noted that the weekly …

entry.title: Michael Saylor's MicroStrategy Bought 169 Bitcoin For $11.4 Million In July
entry.summary:
MicroStrategy Incorporated (Nasdaq: MSTR) reported its financial results for Q2 2024, revealing an increase in its Bitcoin holdings. The company acquired 12,222 bitcoins since the beginning of the quarter, at an average price of $65,882 per bitcoin, bringing its total holdings to 226,500 BTC, purchased for $8.3 billion at an average cost of $36,821 per bitcoin, as of July 31st. In July alone, MicroStrategy acquired an additional 169 BTC for $11.4 million, Michael Saylor announced.
In July, @MicroStrategy acquired an additional 169 BTC for $11.4 million and now holds 226,500 BTC. Please join us at 5pm ET as we discuss our Q2 2024 financial results, the outlook for $BTC, and our #Bitcoin development strategy. $MSTRhttps://t.co/cfGPc42jfM — Michael Saylor⚡️ (@saylor) August 1, 2024
…

entry.title: Ripple Invests In Tokenized US Treasury Bills On XRP Ledger
entry.summary:
RippleX, the developer arm of Ripple, is partnering with OpenEden Labs to introduce tokenized US Treasury bills (T-bills) to the XRP Ledger (XRPL), according to an official press release from August 1. OpenEden Labs is a tokenization platform and announced the launch of its TBILL tokens, which are backed by short-dated US T-bills and reverse repurchase agreements collateralized by US Treasuries.
Ripple Further Expands Its Range Of Products
The introduction of these tokenized assets on the XRPL aligns with a broader trend of integrating real-world assets (RWAs) into blockchain networks. In an effort to bolster the adoption and liquidity of OpenEden’s tokenized T-bills, Ripple has committed to investing $10 million into TBILL tokens.
Via X, Ripple X shared: “News alert – tokenization p…

entry.title: XRP Beats Out Bitcoin, Ethereum, And Dogecoin In July, What Happened?
entry.summary:
The month of July has been one of intense competition, with top coins such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, and Dogecoin battling for dominance. Amid the scuffle, an unlikely victor has emerged, as the XRP price managed to outperform its beloved counterparts to become the performer out of the top 10 largest cryptocurrencies by market cap.
XRP Monthly Returns Trumps Bitcoin, Ethereum, And Dogecoin
According to data from CryptoRank, in the month of July, the XRP price went from struggling to hold $0.4 to retesting $0.65. This surge in price took the market by surprise given that the altcoin’s price has been struggling even during bullish market times where the likes of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Dogecoin were rallying.

entry.title: Occupy Bitcoin: Bitcoin Is Not Just Libertarian
entry.summary: Bitcoin has experienced enormous growth in the past fifteen years since its inception, and with that has come numerous monumental shifts in the culture of the overall ecosystem, as well as the smaller individual communities that make it up. This is obviously something to be expected as the network grew from a tiny niche thing in the corner of the internet to a global phenomenon now becoming a serious political issue all across the world. Bitcoin is no longer a tiny niche thing in the corner, or a toy that only a few autistic nerds are tinkering with, it is a global economic asset and monetary network transferring billions of dollars all over the world every day. Things have obviously changed in the process of that growth, but I think that changing shift has come with substantial negative …

entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$85m. SOL leads majors ahead of ETH ETF. Rumours Trump may want BTC in strategic reserve. Trump BTC round-table tickets going for $845k. Polymarket hits volume record of $20m. ETH ETFs will get steady capital: Binance CEO. Winklevii donate $1m to try and unseat Warren. Tornado sees $1.9bn volume resurgence. New overlay attacks growing in crypto. Messari co-founder faces backlash on views. Raydium integrates with Moonpay. Tencent leads investment round in Chainbase. ZA Bank partners with stablecoin issuers.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 161 - THE BIG WIF COMEBACK?
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$53m. Crypto remains stable despite macro sell-off. ETH ETF providers undercut each other on fees. Grayscale keeps 2.5% high fee, launches mini-fund. Grayscale launches ‘Decentralised AI Fund’. Dimon may be ‘changing tune’ on Bitcoin. Many alts now bounced 50-90% from lows. Vote implies 55% of Mt. Gox depositors won’t sell. BlockFi to make creditor distributions this month. WazirX exchanges sees $230m suspected breach. Vitalik warns against voting ‘pro-crypto’. Vitalik & Autism Capital trade barbs. Bitcoin Magazine to hold pro-Trump fundraiser. State Street explore blockchain payments. UPbit sees 44% monthly drop in volume.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 160 - CHATTING TO ROBINHOOD!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$423m. Crypto pushes higher, biggest ETF inflow in 6 weeks. Mt. Gox FUD ‘overestimated’ as whales accumulate. Kraken to begin Mt. Gox repayments in 7-14d. ETH spot ETFs will push ETH to $5k: Bitwise. SOL ETF will be next: Bloomberg. XRP up 35% this week ahead of potential settlement. Aethir reports $36m H1 customer revenue. Craig Wright now under threat of perjury & forgery. FTX & CFTC in $12.7bn settlement. WLD up 40% after delaying unlock schedule. Helio announces instant crypto fiat commerce. Phantom pauses cross-chain swaps amid exploit.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 159 - MEMECOINS GO MAD!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$301m. BTC dips from $65k as $6bn moves from Mt. Gox. Coinbase & MicroStrategy surge with BTC. Genesis sells another $38m BTC. ETH ETF timeline delayed until July 23rd. Trump chooses crypto friendly Vance as VP. Old clip shows Vance bashing Gensler on crypto. Bitcoin is good during debasement: Larry Fink. Michael Dell calls Fink video ‘fascinating’. Fear & Greed index shifts to Greed. Tether mints $1bn USDT on Tron. Stripe expands crypto integration to the EU.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 158 - A WILD WEEKEND FOR BITCOIN
entry.summary: Trump response optimism takes BTC to $63K. Bitcoin whales accumulate most since April 2023. Trump still set to talk at Bitcoin Nashville. ETH ETF approval this week: Geraci. XRP vs SEC press conference rumoured on 18th. Crypto funds saw $1.44B inflows last week. Rumours China is to ‘unban BTC’ in Q4. S. Korea may delay crypto taxes until 2028. Russia to allow crypto trading on stock exchange. All altcoin categories outperform BTC over 7d. BitConnect infamous promoter convicted. Scroll becomes 8th L2 with TVL over $1bn. ETHFI Season 2 claims available this week. Base hits record 1m UserOps in a week.

entry.title: Zoltan Istvan on AI and Human Immortality
entry.summary: Transhumanist Party founder Zoltan Istvan chats with Decrypt's Emerging Technology report Jason Nelson about his journey with transhumanism, running for office, and why he fears AI is outpacing life science and poses a threat to the quest for immortality.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 157 - ROLLBIT FRIDAY!
entry.summary: The German state sells $2bn+ BTC and has under $300m left. BTC ETF sees $800M of inflows, Mr 100 keeps buying. SOL ETF deadline set for 2025, election could be key. SOL stablecoin TVL soars on Tether & PYUSD growth. Firedancer sees the first accepted block on SOL testnet. ETH ETFs finally expected next week. Monthly active crypto addresses top 100m. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville conference. Golman Sachs to launch 3 tokenization projects. Short squeeze in altcoins sees TIA rise 80% from lows. MOG leads top memes coins, BONK flips WIF. Farming interest shifts to Berachain & Monad.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token
entry.summary:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.
In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he’s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn’t done with the project. Instead, he’s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.
